forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Clear, with a low around 59. West southwest wind 7 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 20 mph.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 74, with temperatures falling to around 72 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 17 mph, with gusts as high as 21 mph.

weather_report:
As twilight envelops Downtown San Francisco this evening, the air is refreshingly crisp and clear. The remnants of the day linger in a shimmering palette of soft pastels, as a gentle breeze brushes the edges of the skyline, whispering tales of the setting sun. With a predicted low of 59, the night promises a comfortable retreat from the warmth of the afternoon, inviting those who roam the streets to slip into light layers. The city, under a canopy of clarity, appears free from the usual encroachment of fog—a rare gift for those chasing shadows and light. The winds, teasingly playful at speeds up to 14 mph, will dance across the bay, adding a hint of vigor to the otherwise serene atmosphere.

Tomorrow, the sun will return, spilling golden hues across the landscape. Expect inviting temperatures that peak around 74 before gently receding as the sun arcs towards the horizon, complemented by winds that promise a refreshing embrace. The forecast speaks of sunshine, a perfect backdrop for leisurely strolls along the Embarcadero or nestled moments at a sidewalk café, where a simple cup of coffee can taste as vibrant as the surroundings. Layered clothing will serve you well once again—a light jacket for the persistently playful breeze and comfort for a day spent exploring the city’s hidden treasures.
